tool_description: Unofficial mobile legends heroes, allow you to query all heroes and roles available.
title: Unofficial mobile legends

api_list.name: Role name
api_list.description: Return all heroes with specific roles
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unofficial-mobile-legends.p.rapidapi.com/roles/{name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unofficial-mobile-legends.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
